message.body: Any special requests from down this way?
I wish I could think of something but naw, I'm cool. Arrival estimate?!?
Night time. Todd will be ready to go around 7. Soooo....
Sweet!! We'll have cold beers on the front porch awaiting
:D
Hey, do you know if there's anyplace to grab some food on rt-80 or whatever that road is up there? I'm about 12 miles from it and pretty hungry.
Well, are you down with sheetz?
That's my go-to
Or do you want a restaurant? We could meet at frog towns bar and have a beer
While you eat pub grub
Raleigh and I are down for that, or you could grab sheetz real quick. Whatever.
I personally can do either really but I'm also with Todd.and he's super low on $$ till pay day.
I also grabbed a handle of whisky before I left.
Ok so why don't you head to sheetz then
OR just come right here
And I'll make you a banging turkey and cheese sandwich
I promise it'll be good.
But if you decide on sheetz, get off at exit 256, turn left on route 93 south and drive like 2 miles past the grocery store and stuff. It'll be on your left.
Hey, if Netflix might help, turn on the tv and zone out
There are directions on the coffee table for which remotes to use
Just FYI, I'll be home closer to 1030-11. Hay took longer than expected and I still have to run the recycling over
